members.member: \brief Select an action in dependent of outer influences (intereference pulses). This class handle the relation between outer influences such as balance problematic pulses, vision navigation, etc. and the control variable. It has a autonomous functionality to control the robot in an environment. At the beginning (after booting up) the control data were loaded from remote server (sql database) and were stored locally.
\brief Start controlling the robot. In every cycle: Check incoming dta (vision, stand up stability, etc.). Set control data.
\brief Load control data from remote sql database. Create connection to remote sql database. Copy conten of database to local database.

\brief Packaging new data from upper control algorithm. This class handle the actions that were called from upper control algorithm and results (pendings, completings) that comes from the client. It packs the selected action with specific parameters to byte array. The byte array contains among others: Tasknumber, Velocity, Endposition When data is packed an event is fired that the server can send the new packaged data to clients
EXAMPLE:
Upper control algorithm sends "New Position" like 10 deg with veloctity 10% and motor ID 1 DataPackager package this data to an byte array and fire event. ServerUnit receive this new data and send it to client. The client responds at first with the pending state and after completion with completion state. The DataPackager reset its state after receiving the completion state
PACKAGE CONSTRUCT OUTGOING
Every cycle the algorithm send 8 byte via tcp/ip to the client One data block per send cycle contains the data for one motor
1. byte: action 2. byte: motor id 3. byte: velocity 4. byte: angle 5. byte: angle 6. byte: Direction of the motor 7. byte: 8. byte:
PACKAGE CONSTRUCT INCOMING
1. byte: action 2. byte: motor id 3. byte: action state 4. byte: 5. byte: 6. byte: 7. byte: 8. byte:
Start thread to handle the packaging of new data.

\brief Checks states / actions and pack data. Check inside loop the current action that comes from upper control algorithm. Check the states that comes from the client. Pack all the control data to byte array package (global data) and fire event.
\brief A set of generally used functions.
\brief A collection of pulse data (sinus, sawtooth, etc.).
\brief HMI to control and parametrize the robot.
